Title: Orchestructure, March 2019: Exploring IPv6 at Home: Preparing for the Future of the Internet Protocol
Description: An overview of IPv6, and a demonstration of how to set up IPv4/6 dual-stack networks at home.

Title: GopherCon 2018 - Lightning Talk: Linux, Netlink, and Go in 7 minutes or less!
Description: Manipulating the Linux kernel using Netlink with Go.

Title: GopherCon 2018: Implementing a Network Protocol in Go
Description: Implementing the IPv6 Neighbor Discovery Protocol in Go.

Title: OVS Orbit podcast: Networking with OVS at DigitalOcean
Description: Matt Layher and Armando Migliaccio discuss Open vSwitch networking at DigitalOcean.

Title: KubeCon/Cloud Native Con EU 2018: How to export Prometheus metrics from just about anything
Description: Gathering and exporting Prometheus metrics with Go from files, devices, and system calls.

Title: Open vSwitch 2017 Fall Conference: OvS manipulation with Go at DigitalOcean
Description: How DigitalOcean controls Open vSwitch using the Go programming language.

Title: GopherCon 2017 - Lightning Talk: Ethernet and Go
Description: A lightning talk about using Ethernet frames and raw sockets directly in Go.
